triples.name: Information extraction
triples.relevance: Event extraction is a fundamental subtask of information extraction for converting unstructured text into structured formats.

triples.name: Named-entity recognition
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the error propagation problem that arises from relying on entity recognition as a preprocessing step.

triples.name: Question answering
triples.relevance: The paper proposes formulating event extraction as a question answering task as the novel paradigm.

triples.name: Zero-shot learning
triples.relevance: The framework demonstrates capability to extract event arguments for roles not seen during training, achieving zero-shot learning.
